title: Settings
description: You can make your personal settings and system settings of Åžef through this page.

users.description: Through this page you can add roles to users, edit user profiles and add new ones.
users.name: Name Surname

validation.n_min: Name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.n_max: Name must be at most 50 characters.

validation.name_max: Username must be at most 50 characters.

validation.password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters.
validation.password_max: Password must be at most 50 characters.

create.title: Add User
create.description: You can create a new user using this window.

delete.success: The user has been deleted successfully.
delete.error: An error occurred while deleting the user.
delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.subtext: The selected user ({{username}}) will be completely deleted from the Åžef system. As a result of this process, you may lose your case data and extension permissions. Do you want to continue?

toasts.edit_error_msg: An error occurred while editing the chatbot.

validation.name_min: Name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.name_max: Name must be at most 255 characters.
validation.description_max: Description must be at most 1000 characters.

create.title: Add Chatbot
create.description: You can create a new chatbot using this window.

edit.title: Edit Chatbot

delete.success: The chatbot has been deleted successfully.

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: View and manage chat sessions in the system.

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Manage your AI tools and their configurations
tools.name: Name
tools.assign_category_description: Move {{count}} selected tool(s) to a category
tools.basic_info_description: Provide basic information about your tool.
tools.configuration_description: Configure the parameters for your tool.
tools.name_help: Only lowercase letters and underscores allowed
tools.create_description: Create a new tool for your AI assistants.
tools.delete_confirm_description: Are you sure you want to delete this tool? This action cannot be undone.
tools.parameters_description: Define the parameters that will be passed to this tool when executed.
tools.run_test_to_see_results: Run a test to see the results here
tools.describe_what_you_want: Describe what you want to extract
tools.describe_extraction: e.g., Extract all user names from the response
tools.existing_query_help: Provide an existing query to refine or improve
tools.generation_params_help: Parameters that can be used in the generated query
tools.jq_params_help: Parameters to pass to the JQ query for filtering

import.title: Import Tools
import.description: Import API tools from Postman collections or OpenAPI/Swagger specifications.
import.drag_drop: Drag and drop your JSON file here
import.supported_formats: Supports Postman collections and OpenAPI/Swagger specifications in JSON or YAML format
import.update_existing: Update existing tools with same names

export.title: Export Tools
export.description: Export {{count}} selected tool(s) to a file
export.no_selection: Please select at least one tool to export

category.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this category? This action cannot be undone.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Manage documents and knowledge base for RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation).

validation.title_min: Title must be at least 2 characters
validation.title_max: Title must be at most 255 characters
validation.description_max: Description must be at most 1000 characters
validation.content_required: Content is required for markdown documents

create.title: Create New Document
create.description: Create a new document by writing markdown or uploading a file.
create.content_placeholder:
# My Document

Write your markdown content here...
create.markdown_help: You can use Markdown syntax including headings, lists, links, etc.

edit.title: Edit Document
edit.description: Update the document information and content.
edit.content_placeholder:
# My Document

Write your markdown content here...
edit.content_help: Edit the markdown content and save to re-process the document.
edit.non_text_file: This document is not a text file and cannot be edited here. You can only update the title and description.

upload.title: Upload New Document
upload.description: Upload a document to add to your knowledge base. Supported formats: TXT, MD, PDF, DOC, DOCX
upload.validation_error: Please select a file and enter a title

delete.title: Delete Document
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This will remove the document and all its embeddings.

embedding.title: Embedding Settings
embedding.description: Configure embedding model and vector settings for RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation).
embedding.configure_description: Select an Ollama provider and embedding model for document processing
embedding.provider_help: Select an Ollama provider that has embedding models available
embedding.model_help: Only embedding models are shown (e.g., nomic-embed-text, mxbai-embed-large)
embedding.vector_size_help: Dimension of the embedding vectors (auto-filled based on model)
embedding.validation_error: Please select a provider, model, and vector size
embedding.fetch_models_error: Failed to fetch embedding models from provider
embedding.info_1: â€¢ Changing the embedding configuration will affect all new documents uploaded after the change.
embedding.info_2: â€¢ Existing documents will keep their original embeddings unless re-processed.
embedding.info_3: â€¢ Make sure the Ollama provider is running and accessible before saving.

widget.title: Widget Integration
widget.description: Integrate and configure Åžef chat widget on your website.
widget.hero_description: Easily integrate AI-powered chat widget into your site!
widget.chatbot_selection_description: No session ID required! Users can now select from available chatbots and manage their own sessions.
widget.how_it_works_3: Selects one â†’ new session created automatically
widget.how_it_works_5: Can view history and resume previous conversations
widget.example_1_description: Initialize in chatbot selection mode with data attributes
widget.example_2_description: Initialize with a pre-created session ID
widget.feature_1_description: Users select from available chatbots. No hardcoded session needed!
widget.feature_2_description: Previous conversations saved locally. Resume anytime with one click.
widget.feature_3_description: Change position, size, colors, and more to match your brand.
widget.feature_4_description: Works perfectly on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
widget.feature_5_description: Pure JavaScript, no dependencies. Less than 5KB minified.
widget.feature_6_description: Simple methods to open, close, and control the chat programmatically.
widget.config_session_id: Specific chat session ID. If omitted, shows chatbot selection.
widget.config_base_url: Base URL of your Åžef instance (default: current origin)
widget.config_width: Width of the chat popover in pixels (default: 400)
widget.config_height: Height of the chat popover in pixels (default: 600)
widget.config_button_color: Color of the floating action button (default: '#0070f3')
widget.note_description: Add the widget code to your website's HTML file, just before the </body> tag.
widget.live_demo_description: Test the widget on this page. You can control the widget by clicking the chat button in the bottom-right corner or using the buttons below.
widget.demo_loading_hint: If the widget doesn't load after a while, click 'Reload Widget' or refresh the page.
widget.demo_hint: You can test the widget by clicking the chat icon in the bottom-right corner or using the buttons above.
